Keogh.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a savings plan in the US, used mainly by people who work for themselves rather than for an employer. Keoghs provide the person with a PENSION (=income after they have stopped working)
Keogh.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: You can put money in a Keogh even if you are already covered by a corporate pension or profit-sharing plan.
These days, Keogh plans are of increased interest for executives who have lost their jobs.
